data.message: Why doesn't Em your in the us?? Like bruh come on look out for your fans that's been there since day one..i would like to see ya live before you retire or I'm dead tired dk which will come first

replies.message: mate a think u will find he has fans world wide must be hard for someone like him to do tours all around the world when clearly he has fans in mostly every country tbf lol
I remember he did a show in Chicago for lollapalooza like 3 years ago. I'm still mad that I couldn't go
Just saying we would like to see him in the states once in awhile he hasn't been in very long time that's why fans go nuts when he does surprise appearances at a drake or Rihanna show
Yeea, he's been to Glasgow a lot, though. Definitely not as much in the US as he should. It's like, he only tours the US after an album release... Then he's back in Europe for 4 yrs lol

His last tour  in the u.s. (if u want to call it that) was two shows one in ny the other in detroit.. I'd love to get to see him.at least once . . I don't even think he's ever even stepped foot near Virginia.. maybe d.c.  being closest if im right
I saw him in 2002 at the Anger Management tour. Best show ever! He doesn't tour anymore because he doesn't want to fall back into bad habits.

He was on DC for the HBO Veterans show 2-3 years ago (it's too early, I can't remember what it was called). It was free, with vets and their fams, along w HBO corporate spaces getting the front section. So if you had gone, you would have only seen him on screen. He went last, performed 4 songs, it was near 10pm, and people still bitched that he used too much profanity. Idk if he'll be back :)
He hates his country, FUCK HIM

FUCK ALL OF YOU PEOPLE THAT KEEP TUNING KAK LIKE COME HERE OR COME THERE THIS MAN IS RAPGOD "THOU SHALT NOT PASS" in other words..kindly fook off..bastards he has a life of his own...if he made his entire life into a carreer then whats the point on being alive then
you people think he has clones and replicas that he can go any where in the world at the same time, he has done his tours in US time to give others a piece of the pie
It's just been mad long tho since he's been in us
